*This page contains an outline of the topics, content, and assignments for the semester. Note that this schedule will be updated as the semester progresses, with all changes documented here.*

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(gt)
library(tidyverse)
d <- read_csv(here::here("course-info", "schedule.csv"))
```

```{r}
#| echo: false

d |>
  filter(Publish == "x") |>
  select(-Publish) |>
  mutate(due = mdy(due)) |>
  gt() |>
  fmt_date(due, date_style = 31) |>
  sub_missing(columns = c(week, due, topic, reading, slides, video, assignment), missing_text = "") |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(week)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "center", 
    columns = c(due)
  ) |>
  cols_align(
    align = "left", 
    columns = c(topic, reading, slides, video)
  ) |>
  tab_style(
    style = cell_borders(
      sides = "right",
      color = "#D3D3D3",
      style = "solid"
    ),
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(due, type, topic, reading, slides, video)
    )
  ) |>
  fmt_markdown(
    columns = c(type, topic, reading, slides, video)
  ) |>
  cols_width(
    week ~ px(45),
    due ~ px(300), 
    reading ~ px(150),
    topic ~ px(300),
    slides ~ px(300),
    video ~ px(300)
  ) |>
  cols_label_with(fn = function(x) {
      janitor::make_clean_names(x, case = "title") |>
        toupper() |>
        stringr::str_replace_all("^|$", "**") |>
        md()
    }) |>
  tab_options(table.font.size = 13) |>
  opt_row_striping()
```
